# id

**Instance Property**

The generic product ID.

## Declaration

```swift
let id: AdvancedCommerceProduct.ID
```

## Discussion

You create the generic product ID in App Store Connect when you set up your project to use the Advanced Commerce API. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AdvancedCommerceAPI/setting-up-your-project-for-advanced-commerce].

## Getting the product ID and type

- **AdvancedCommerceProduct.ProductType**
- **type**: The type of the product.
